column4: Hey, I booted a Native install of Ubuntu through a VM, however I can't boot the native Ubuntu anymore. It still works through the VM any ideas?
It goes into some weird recovery boot mode
Possibly because the change of hardware
I get to the grub menu
and click to boot the ubuntu 11.10 and some text shows up.
(Really new to ubuntu I could go jump on another comp and boot into and tell you brb
It gets to determining the battery percentage?
and does going to vt 6 or 7 show your dm
do you even have one and start in init 3 or whatever ubuntu calls it
uhm boot to init 1 if you can or whatever ubuntu calls it
